document_data.name: Dathchaunt's Deathbolt
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dathchaunt's deathbolt''''' was the first [[combination spell]]. It was developed by [[Dathchaunt Sandrach]].
document_data.Effects: The spell was identical to ''[[fireball]]'', but the area was then struck through by lightning, as if from a ''[[lightning bolt]]''; however, the strength of the lightning was only slightly over half of the flame's.
document_data.Components: Besides verbal and somatic components, the spell called for a pinch or more of  [[saltpeter]] or [[phosphorus]], a small, smoothed piece of amber, and ash from a tree scorched by lightning.
document_data.History: This was the first of the [[combination spell]]s. It was created by the [[Magister]] [[Dathchaunt Sandrach]].
